games.name: Mutazone
games.title: MUTAZONE
games.contentText:
In MUTAZONE, players must survive relentless waves of zombies in a post-apocalyptic world. Enhance your gear with powerful weapons and armor, and customize your character with unique clothes. Along the way, collect pets with special abilities to aid in battle.

Only the resourceful will endure to face the ultimate test of survival at the end. Will you conquer the zombie apocalypse, or join the fallen? The fate of humanity rests in your hands.

games.name: Monster Merge
games.title: MONSTER MERGE
games.contentText: Embark on a journey through an ever-expanding castle. Merge your characters to unveil new sections of the castle and reveal hidden treasures. Monsters, fairytale creatures and unicorns unite to unlock powerful upgrades.

games.name: Spaders
games.title: SPADERS
games.contentText:
A mindful puzzle adventure where your cute creatures clean the board to advance through increasingly challenging levels. Each puzzle solved unlocks new areas. 

With each level, sharpen your problem-solving skills as you strategically direct your little helpers to clear the way and uncover new surprises,

games.name: Galactic Empire
games.title: GALACTIC EMPIRE
games.contentText:
In Galactic Empire, players dive into an idle/merge game where they drain resources from asteroids to bolster their fleet. By strategically merging and upgrading ships, they prepare to face off against a formidable legion of bandits.

As resources are collected and fleets are enhanced, new challenges and powerful adversaries emerge, demanding keen strategy and efficient resource management. Conquer the galaxy, build an unstoppable armada, and crush the bandit forces in Galactic Empire.

games.name: 6 Words
games.title: 6 WORDS
games.contentText:
In 6Words, players engage in a daily word puzzle challenge, using a limited set of letters to find six different words. Each day brings a new combination of letters, testing vocabulary and creativity.

With only a few letters at your disposal, can you uncover all six words before the day ends? Dive into the addictive fun of 6Words and sharpen your linguistic skills daily.

games.name: Bricks
games.title: BRICKS
games.contentText:
BRICKS is an innovative Tetris-inspired rogue-lite game that introduces a fresh twist to the classic puzzle gameplay. Every few turns, players encounter unique modifiers that alter the mechanics, creating a dynamic and challenging experience.

Navigate through falling bricks while adapting to the ever-changing rules, combining strategy and quick thinking to progress and achieve high scores.
